Hongmen reservoir, built in 1958, is located on the ruins of the ancient Xiaoshi Township, which was an important trade center and hub for water transportation between Jiangxi and Fujian provinces. 

The statue was somewhat preserved in the water, which prevented weathering. Archaeologists will continue research for the protection of the reservoir's underwater relics.

Shanghai just added yet another attraction to its list.  The new nautilus-inspired Shanghai Natural History Museum, opened its doors to the public in late April.

The mountains on either side of the gorge - the Jade Dragon Snow Mountain and the Haba Snow Mountain - have peaks at over 5,000 meters, making this a hike only for the intrepid.

message:
Xiaolongbao (小笼包) is a steamed dumpling with a thin skin filled with either pork or crab meat and warm pork broth.  Dip these goodies in a concoction of vinegar, soy sauce, and ginger!

Did you know that the broth is actually jellied and only liquifies when steamed?

Happy #FoodieFriday!
